name: Electric Playground Sphere Clicker
description:
Based around the popular G4TV show back in 2003-2006 Electric Playground/Judgement Day. All voice clips are from the Electric Playground/Judgement Day show. I personally made all the music.  In this game you click spheres that give you different points based on what color sphere you click. Teal spheres give 1 pt, red spheres give 5 pts, and black spheres give 10 pts. If you get a score high enough in 30 seconds than you make it to the next level. There are a total of 5 levels in the game. 

Made with the Unity Engine with C#.

Email me at jbchmbrs@gmail.com if you have any questions or just want to contact me
